name: GitLab
description: GitLab is used as a default version control based on Git. The group for the Xsolla Account domain projects: https://gitlab.loc/babka

name: Atlassian Confluence
description: Confluence is used as a primary tool for storing engeneering and business documentation. The common Xsolla Account engeneering and architectural documents are stored here: https://xsolla.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/XAE/overview

name: Atlassian Jira
description: Jira is used for task management and planning.

name: Kanban
description: Currently, Kanban is adopted as a primary practice for task management and development.

name: Scrum
description: Scrum is not used anymore because of the transition to Kanban.

name: Golang
description: Golang is a single language for backend development.

name: Temporal
description: We pilot Temporal as a tool for orchestration and scheduling.

name: IcePanel
description: We are considering IcePanel as a tool for architecture modeling. The demo project: https://s.icepanel.io/4M74u6Ui5qTBms/YHRj

name: JetBrains GoLand
description: GoLand is used as a default IDE for applications written on Golang.

name: Rooster
description: Rooster is an in-house framework for development microservices on Golang. The sources and documentation are here: https://gitlab.loc/platform/rooster
